products.description: iPhone 14 with advanced dual-camera system, A15 Bionic chip, and all-day battery life. Features Crash Detection and Emergency SOS via satellite.
iPhone 14 Pro with Dynamic Island, Always-On display, and pro camera system. Features the powerful A16 Bionic chip and 48MP Main camera.
The ultimate iPhone experience with Dynamic Island, 48MP Main camera, and USB-C connectivity. Features the powerful A16 Bionic chip.
iPhone 15 Pro with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and pro camera system. Features customizable Action button and advanced gaming capabilities.
The next generation iPhone with advanced AI capabilities, improved camera system, and revolutionary battery life. Powered by A18 Bionic chip.
iPhone 16 Pro with advanced camera system, A18 Pro chip, and titanium design. Features enhanced AI capabilities and professional photography tools.
The future of iPhone with revolutionary AI features, foldable display technology, and breakthrough battery performance. Powered by A19 Bionic chip.
iPhone 17 Pro with revolutionary foldable design, A19 Pro chip, and professional-grade camera system. Features advanced AI capabilities and holographic display.

specifications.Camera: 64MP Main, 12MP Ultra Wide, 12MP Telephoto 10x, LiDAR Scanner

products.description: Next-level AI phone with Galaxy AI features, powerful camera system, and stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display.
The ultimate Galaxy with titanium frame, S Pen, and advanced AI features. Features 200MP camera and Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor.
Powered by Google Tensor G3 with advanced AI features, pro-level camera system, and smooth 120Hz display. Features Magic Editor, Best Take, and 7 years of OS updates.
Flagship killer with Hasselblad camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and 100W fast charging. Never Settle.
Supercharged by M3 Pro or M3 Max chips, MacBook Pro takes its power and efficiency further than ever.
The world's best consumer laptop for AI. Supercharged by M3 chip with all-day battery life.
The world's most powerful 15-inch laptop with stunning OLED display, latest processors, and premium design.
Premium 2-in-1 laptop with stunning design, powerful performance, and all-day battery life. Perfect for work and creativity.
Ultra-light business laptop with military-grade durability and exceptional battery life.
Powerful gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9 and NVIDIA RTX graphics in a compact 14-inch form factor.
Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality, a lightweight design, and crystal-clear hands-free calling.
Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and Personalised Spatial Audio for immersive sound experience.
Premium over-ear headphones with high-fidelity audio, Active Noise Cancellation, and spatial audio.
World-class noise cancellation, balanced audio performance, and all-day comfort with up to 24 hours of battery life.
Advanced wireless earbuds with intelligent ANC, 360 audio, and seamless Galaxy ecosystem integration.
The most powerful Apple Watch yet with new Double Tap gesture, brighter display, and on-device Siri.
The most rugged and capable Apple Watch with advanced fitness features, dive computer, and action button.
Advanced health monitoring, premium design, and seamless connectivity with enhanced fitness tracking features.
Premium smartwatch with rotating bezel, advanced health monitoring, and comprehensive fitness tracking.
Quantum Dot technology with 4K resolution, HDR10+, and smart TV features with Bixby voice assistant.
Perfect black OLED display with α9 AI Processor, Dolby Vision IQ, and webOS smart platform.
Next-gen gaming console with ultra-high-speed SSD, haptic feedback, and 3D Audio.
The fastest, most powerful Xbox ever with 4K gaming, 120 FPS, and Xbox Game Pass.
Smart display with Google Assistant, sleep sensing, and hands-free control for your smart home.
15-inch smart display with Alexa, family organization features, and full HD video calling.
